data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Wu, Zhang, Yalin (2012): Revision of the Oriental leafhopper genus Parallygus Melichar (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) with description of new species. Zootaxa 3157: 41-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210583
